description: This file declares exported API functions for the Slap Obj Proxy Object in the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP), including creation, removal, enrollment, and initialization functions.

methods.name: SlapCreateObjProxy
methods.description: Creates an object proxy handle given container, owner, and reserved contexts.

methods.name: SlapOpoCreate
methods.description: Creates an instance of the Slap Obj Proxy Object.

methods.name: SlapOpoRemove
methods.description: Removes the specified Slap Obj Proxy Object instance.

methods.name: SlapOpoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls objects in the context of the Slap Obj Proxy.

methods.name: SlapOpoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the Slap Obj Proxy Object.
